definition: IEEE/Institute of Electrical and Electronic Engineers
pinyin: Dian4 ji1 ji2 Dian4 zi3 xue2 Gong1 cheng2 shi1 Lian2 he2 hui4
containing_words.word: 電機及電子學工程師聯合會

sentences.english: The verification and measurement plan of checking fixture dimension should be confirmed by YFV engineer.
sentences.chinese: 檢具的尺寸驗證測量計劃需得到延鋒工程師的確認。

sentences.english: Moni tor work quality and feedback abnormality to WT engineer.
sentences.chinese: 監督工作質量並及時向工程師反饋異常。

sentences.english: So how can engineers balance the conflicting demands?
sentences.chinese: 工程師們如何尋找其中矛盾的結合點呢？

sentences.english: Currently, I'm the general engineer of Shenyang Machine Tools Plant in charge of Quality control.
sentences.chinese: 目前我任瀋陽機械工具廠總工程師，負責質量控制。

sentences.english: Yost was an engineer involved in the development of high-altitude weather balloons.
sentences.chinese: 約斯特是一名工程師參與制訂高空氣象氣球。

sentences.english: Conquering its challenges has become the quest of Chinese engineers.
sentences.chinese: 征服所有挑戰已經成了中國工程師們孜孜的追求。

sentences.english: The committee was composed of professors and engineers.
sentences.chinese: 委員會由教授和工程師組成。

sentences.english: The company reinstated him as chief engineer.
sentences.chinese: 該公司恢復了他的總工程師職務。

sentences.english: What makes design easier is developing a good work-flow, a good system for design.
sentences.chinese: 來自上海的網頁前端開發工程師和網頁設計師。

sentences.english: The Industrial Revolution began with such machines; the millwrights were the engineers of the coming age.
sentences.chinese: 修造磨坊的匠人就是開創新時代的工程師。

sentences.english: The dam builders claim they have completed an adequate design and safety analysis.
sentences.chinese: 水壩工程師聲稱，他們做了充分的設計和安全性分析。

sentences.english: The unemployed engineer wrote a dozen applications for jobs but go nothing.
sentences.chinese: 失業的工程師一連寫了十幾封求職信，但一無所獲。

sentences.english: The engineer interlarded his speech with many technical terms.
sentences.chinese: 這位工程師在他的講話中夾雜着許多術語。

sentences.english: Chief engineer of reactor control supervises the reactor.
sentences.chinese: 反應堆控制總工程師監督反應堆。

sentences.english: The international team of engineers have real pride in their work.
sentences.chinese: 這裏的國際工程師們對這一偉大工程感到非常驕傲。

sentences.english: I suddenly remembered the two resident engineers' great trust.
sentences.chinese: 突然間想起了兩位駐地工程師的重託。

definition: to hold an office or post
to be in charge of/to take responsibility for/to be to blame/conscientious
to go for/to engage in/to undertake/to deal with/to handle/to do
